Initialization Settings

Use the below form if you need to use non-default initialization settings for the bbg-market-data library, including session options, session identity options or overriding protocol methods.

Click the "Initialize Library" button to continue.

A string to be inserted at the default protocol methods names, e.g. if you enter "Mock" then "T42.MdfApi.CreateRequest" becomes "T42.MdfApi.MockCreateRequest". Leave blank unless you have configured the Bloomberg Adapter appropriately.
